botinfo.title: BotInfo | {{botName}}
botinfo.description:
Hello, I'm {{botName}}, a bot with unique functionality that every server needs! I currently know **{{users}}** different ones that use my commands and on **{{guilds}}** servers that also make use of my features.
I was developed using [Eris](https://abal.moe/Eris/) & [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/).
For more information, please visit my [website](https://zulybot.xyz/).
